query:
SELECT a.id, a.name, COUNT(p.id) as total_prices
FROM smsApis a
LEFT JOIN prices p ON a.id = p.apiId
GROUP BY a.id, a.name
ORDER BY a.id;
command:

FROM smsApis a
LEFT JOIN prices p ON a.id = p.apiId
GROUP BY a.id, a.name
ORDER BY a.id;
